Container.Name: Terraria-tModloader
Container.Overview:
This Docker will download and install Terraria and the tModloader and run it. SERVER PASSWORD: Docker
ATTENTION: The Container will check on every start/restart if there is a newer version of the game available and install it if so.
Update Notice: Change the game version to whatever version do you want and restart the container. CONSOLE: To connect to the console open up the terminal on the host machine and type in: 'docker exec -u terraria -ti NAMEOFYOURCONTAINER screen -xS Terraria' (without quotes) to exit the screen session press CTRL+A and then CTRL+D or simply close the terminal window in the first place.
